Theater of Pain Guide

11.1 - Undermine(d)

Last Updated:February 26, 2025|Changelog

Welcome to the Theater of Pain Mythic+ guide for the World of Warcraft patch 11.1! This guide covers everything you need to know about your upcoming dungeon runs!

Route

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain

It is recommended to use the Mythic Dungeon Tools addon to look at your route and mobcount before the Mythic+ dungeon starts. Below you can see an example of a Weekly Route meant for +10 keys or lower. High Key Route will be added later into the season!

Simply import the route into the Mythic Dungeon Tool addon and take a look at it with your group.

Weekly Route

High KeyMedium
Pug Hard
Uility neededHard

Utility Needs

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
Enrage
Bleed
Disease
Curse
Magic Dispel
Magic Purge
  • ‍Raging Tantrum
    • An Enrage effect during which Raging Bloodhorn is inflicting physical damage to all players every 2 seconds.
  • ‍Death Wish
    • An Enrage effect which makes Unyielding Contender inflict increased damage but also take increased damage.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Hunter
      • ‍Tranquilizing Shot
    • ‍Rogue
      • ‍Shiv
    • ‍Druid
      • ‍Soothe
    • ‍Evoker
      • ‍Oppressing Roar         with
        ‍Overawe
    • ‍Monk
      • ‍Paralysis         with
        ‍Pressure Points
  • ‍Jagged Gash
    • Bleed inflicting physical damage for 8 seconds.
      • Avoidable by not getting hit by
        ‍Meat Hooks         during the Gorechop encounter.
  • ‍Jagged Quarrel
    • Bleed from a Shambling Arbalest. Usually goes on to dps players.
  • ‍Ricocheting Blade
    • Bleed from mini-bosses in the Xav the Unfallen's trash area.
      • Avoidable by line-of-sighting, does not recast.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Evoker
      • ‍Cauterizing Flame
    • ‍Paladin
      • ‍Blessing of Protection
  • ‍Withering Blight
    • A stacking Disease debuff, inflicting plague damage and reducing damage and healing done by 20%.
      • Interruptible.
  • ‍Decaying Blight
    • Disease inflicting plague damage and reducing maximum health of the player by 5% for 20 seconds.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Monk
      • ‍Detox
      • ‍Detox         with
        ‍Improved Detox         for a
        ‍Mistweaver
    • ‍Paladin
      • ‍Cleanse Toxins
      • ‍Cleanse         with
        ‍Improved Cleanse         for
        ‍Holy
    • ‍Priest
      • ‍Purify Disease
      • ‍Purify         with
        ‍Improved Purify         for
        ‍Discipline         and
        ‍Holy
    • ‍Evoker
      • ‍Cauterizing Flame
  • ‍Curse of Desolation
    • Curse that spawns pools under the afflicted player every 3 seconds, inflicting damage to players within 3 yards of the impact and fearing them for a second.
  • ‍Shadow Vulnerability
    • Curse increasing shadow damage taken by 30%.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Druid
      • ‍Remove Corruption
      • ‍Nature's Cure         for
        ‍Restoration
    • ‍Mage
      • ‍Remove Curse
    • ‍Shaman
      • ‍Cleanse Spirit
      • ‍Purify Spirit         with
        ‍Improved Purify Spirit         for
        ‍Restoration
    • ‍Evoker
      • ‍Cauterizing Flame
  • ‍Withering Touch
    • A Magic debuff that is applied during the first boss encounter. It is applied to 2 people at a time which makes it pretty useful to have an extra dispel available to cover all of them every time.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Priest
      • ‍Mass Dispel
    • ‍Warlock
      • ‍Singe Magic
  • ‍Bone Shield
    • A huge Magic absorb shield.
  • Common utility examples:
    • ‍Warlock
      • ‍Devour Magic
    • ‍Hunter
      • ‍Tranquilizing Shot
    • ‍Priest
      • ‍Dispel Magic         and
        ‍Mass Dispel
    • ‍Shaman
      • ‍Purge
    • ‍Mage
      • ‍Spellsteal
    • ‍Demon Hunter
      • ‍Consume Magic

An Affront of Challengers Trash Area

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
Unyielding Contender
Battlefield Ritualist
Raging Bloodhorn
  • Required Enrage Dispel:
    • ‍Death Wish
      • An Enrage buff that makes caster inflict increased damage but also take increased damage.
  • ‍Charge
    • Charges an enemy and slows its movement speed.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Necrotic Bolt
      • Inflicts shadow damage to a random enemy and applies a healing absorb.
    • ‍Unholy Fervor
      • Heals the target each time they inflict damage.
  • Required Enrage Dispel:
    • ‍Raging Tantrum
      • Raging Bloodhorn goes into a
        ‍Raging Tantrum         inflicting physical damage to all enemies every 2 seconds.
        • This is an Enrage effect and can be soothed.

An Affront of Challengers

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain

An Affront of Challengers is an encounter where you fight Dessia the Decapitator, Paceran the Virulent and Sathel the Accursed all at the same time. Each of them has a set of their own unique abilities.

‍Noxious Spores
‍Decaying Breath
‍Searing Death
‍Withering Touch
‍Necromantic Bolt
‍Mighty Smash
‍Mortal Strike
  • Upon reaching 100 energy, Paceran in Theater of Pain throws vile concoctions at players, inflicting plague damage to any player within the impact location and creates a zone of
    ‍Noxious Spores     for 2.5 minutes, inflicting plague damage every 1.5 seconds to all players standing within it.
  • Big frontal cone targeted at a random player, inflicting plague damage to all players impacted.
    • Always be close to the boss to have an easier time dodging the frontal.
  • Upon reaching 100 energy, Sathel in Theater of Pain applies a
    ‍Searing Death     debuff to every player, inflicting shadow damage to all players within 3 yards of the victim every 3 seconds for 9 seconds.
    • Spread out to not cleave each other with the debuff.
  • Applies a
    ‍Withering Touch     Magic debuff to a random target, inflicting shadow damage every 2 seconds for 12 seconds.
  • Sathel in Theater of Pain blasts a random player, inflicting shadow damage.
    • Interruptible.
  • Upon reaching 100 energy, Dessia unleashes a mighty smash that inflicts nature damage to all players and reduces their movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds.
  • Dessia in Theater of Pain strikes the tank, inflicting physical damage and reducing his healing received by 50% for 5 seconds.

Xav the Unfallen Trash Area

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
Nekthara the Mangler
Rek the Hardened
Harugia the Bloodthirsty
Shambling Arbalest
Ancient Captain
Advent Nevermore
Heavin the Breaker
Dokigg the Brutalizer
  • ‍Whirlwind
    • Inflicts physical damage to players within 13 yards.
  • ‍Interrupting Roar
    • Interrupts spell casting and inflicts physical damage to all players.
  • ‍Whirling Blade
    • Spawns a ground effect, inflicting physical damage to players standing in it.
  • ‍Whirlwind
    • Inflicts physical damage to players within 13 yards.
  • ‍Unbalancing Blow
    • Inflicts physical damage to a tank and reduces his dodge, parry and block chance by 100%.
  • ‍Swift Strikes
    • Increases caster's attack speed and melee attcks strike 2 secondary targets for 45% damage.
  • Required Bleed Dispel:
    • ‍Ricocheting Blade
      • Inflicts physical damage to a random target and applies a Bleed.
        • Can ricochet to additional targets within 5 yards.
        • Can be avoided by going line-of-sight.
  • ‍Shoot
    • Inflicts physical damage to a random target
  • Required Bleed Dispel:
    • ‍Jagged Quarrel
      • Inflicts physical damage to a random target and applies a Bleed.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Demoralizing Shout
      • Reduces damage done by all players by 50%.
  • ‍Commanding Presence
    • Increases nearby allies damage dealt by 25% and reduces area of effect damage taken by 75%.
  • ‍Shield Bash
    • Inflicts physical damage, interrupting casting for 1 second.
  • Required Bleed Dispel:
    • ‍Ricocheting Blade
      • Inflicts physical damage to a random target and applies a Bleed.
        • Can ricochet to additional targets within 5 yards.
        • Can be avoided by going line-of-sight.
  • ‍Seismic Stomp
    • Inflicts physical damage to enemies within 60 yards.
  • ‍Colossus Smash
    • Inflicts physical damage and causes a tank to take 50% increased physical damage for 10 seconds.
  • ‍Interrupting Roar
    • Interrupts spell casting and inflicts physical damage to all players.
  • ‍Ground Smash
    • Stuns all enemies within 20 yards and inflicts physical damage to them.
  • ‍Savage Flurry
    • Inflicts physical damage to a tank every 0.5 seconds for 4 seconds.
  • ‍Earthcrusher
    • Inflicts physical damage to all players and spawns ground effects, inflicting nature damage to players within 4 yards of impact.
  • ‍Whirlwind
    • Inflicts physical damage to enemies within 13 yards.

Xav the Unfallen

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
‍Blood and Glory
‍Might of Maldraxxus
‍Oppressive Banner
‍Brutal Combo
  • Upon reaching 100 energy, Xav forces 2 players into the dueling pit below. The winner of the duel is granted
    ‍Glorified     while the loser is affected by
    ‍Bloodied    .
    • Players gain a stack of
      ‍Glorious Combat       every second.
    • If neither player is defeated within 45 seconds, both players are affected by
      ‍Cowardice      .
  • ‍Glorified
    • Damage dealt increased by 10% for 20 seconds.
  • ‍Bloodied
    • Damage dealt decreased by 10% for 20 seconds.
  • ‍Glorious Combat
    • Combatants take 3% increased damage, stacking every second.
  • ‍Cowardice
    • Damage dealt reduced by 10% for 20 seconds.
  • Xav leaps to the center of the arena inflicting physical damage to all players and performs a random combination of attacks.
    • ‍Deafening Crash
      • Xav stomps, interrupting all spellcasting within 55 yards for 2 seconds and inflicts physical damage and knocks back players within 12 yards.
    • ‍Massive Cleave
      • Xav slashes in a frontal hemisphere, inflicting physical damage to all players struck.
    • ‍Crushing Slam
      • Xav slams the ground, inflicting physical damage to players in a line in front of him.
  • Xav plants an Oppressive Banner, reducing the movement speed of all players by 15% every 3 seconds while it persists.
    • This effect stacks but can be refreshed to 0 with any kind of freedom effects like
      ‍Blessing of Freedom      .
  • A series of brutal melee strikes that inflict increasing physical damage to the tank.

Kul'tharok Trash Area

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
Portal Guardian
Maniacal Soulbinder
Bone Magus
Soulforged Bonereaver
Nefarious Darkspeaker
Shackled Soul
  • Required Curse Dispel:
    • ‍Shadow Vulnerability
      • Applies a Curse to a random player, inflicting shadow damage and increasing shadow damage taken by 30%.
  • ‍Soulstorm
    • Inflicts shadow damage to all players every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Necrotic Bolt Volley
      • Inflicts shadow damage to all enemies and applies a healing absorb.
    • ‍Necrotic Bolt
      • Inflicts shadow damage to a random target and applies a healing absorb.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Bone Spear
      • Inflicts physical damage to a random player and applies a Bleed.
        • This cast is very deadly and should be always kicked.
    • ‍Grave Spike
      • Inflicts physical damage to a random player.
  • Required Magic Purge:
    • ‍Bone Shield
      • A Magic buff that absorbs incoming damage.
  • ‍Bonestorm
    • Inflicts physical damage to enemies within 8 yards every second for 4 seconds.
  • ‍Bone Spikes
    • Spawns pools on the ground at players locations every second, inflicting shadow damage to any player within 3 yards of the impact.
  • Required Curse Dispel:
    • ‍Curse of Desolation
      • Applies a Curse to a random player that spawns pools on the ground every 3 seconds, inflicting damage to players within 3 yards of the impact and fearing them for a second.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Spirit Frost
      • Inflicts frost damage to a tank.
  • ‍Death Winds
    • A frontal tornado that inflicts shadow damage and knocks any player caught in the path.
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Bind Soul
      • Reduces the movement speed of the target and inflicts shadow damage every 1.5 seconds.

Kul'tharok

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
‍Draw Soul
‍Well of Darkness
‍Necrotic Eruption
‍Necrotic Bolt
‍Death Spiral
  • Kul'tharok tears the souls from players, inflicting shadow damage every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.
    • The lost souls move toward Kul'tharok and causes
      ‍Soul Corruption       when they reach him, inflicting shadow damage to all players.
  • Kul'tharok applies a
    ‍Well of Darkness     debuff to 2 random players, inflicting shadow damage to players within 4 yards.
    • Spread out with it and don't cleave each other.
  • A frontal line on a tank, inflicting shadow damage to all players within it.
  • Inflicts shadow damage to a random target.
    • Interruptible.
  • Kul'tharok spawns 4 orbs that travel around the arena and inflict shadow damage every second to any player who touches them.

Gorechop Trash Area

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
Blighted Sludge-Spewer
Putrid Butcher
Disgusting Refuse
Diseased Horror
Rancid Gasbag
  • Required Kick:
    • ‍Withering Discharge
      • Inflicts plague damage to all players and applies a Disease to them.
    • ‍Decaying Filth
      • Inflicts plague damage to a random player and afflicts them with a Disease, inflicting plague damage every 2 seconds and reducing maximum health by 5%.
  • ‍Leaping Thrash
    • Leaps towards a random player, inflicting physical damage to all enemies within 4 yards.
      • Always stay spread while fighting this mob to reduce incoming damage on the group.
  • ‍Disgusting Burst
    • On death, inflicts plague damage to all players within 4 yards of the impact area and applies a Disease to them.
  • ‍Devour Flesh
    • Inflicts physical damage to the tank and heals the caster for 300% of the damage dealt.
  • ‍Leaping Thrash
    • Leaps towards a random player, inflicting physical damage to all enemies within 4 yards.
      • Always stay spread while fighting this mob to reduce incoming damage on the group.
  • ‍Disgusting Burst
    • On death, inflicts plague damage to all players within 4 yards of the impact area and applies a Disease to them.
  • ‍Meat Shield
    • Surrounds the caster with an absorb shield.
  • ‍Decaying Strike
    • Inflicts physical damage to a player and applies a Disease to him.
  • ‍Disease Cloud
    • Constantly inflicts plague damage to nearby players every 2 seconds while in combat.
  • ‍Vile Eruption
    • A double frontal infront and behind Rancid Gasbag that inflicts plague damage and disorients players struck by the frontal.

Gorechop

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
‍Meat Hooks
‍Tenderizing Smash
‍Hateful Strike
  • Meat hooks descend and sweep across the arena. Players that are struck by a meat hook are stunned and suffer
    ‍Jagged Gash    , a Bleed inflicting physical damage every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.
  • Some meat hooks have Oozing Leftovers attached to them that will fall apart and attack players.
    • Oozing Leftovers lose 2% of their maximum health every second.
    • They leap towards a random player, inflicting physical damage and cleaving anyone within 4 yards of the impact location.
      • Try to stay spread whenever the mobs are alive.
    • Upon death, they leave a pool of
      ‍Coagulating Ooze       that inflicts plague damage every 1.5 seconds to players standing in them and reduces their movement speed by 30%.
  • Gorechop pulls in all players and smashes the ground, inflicting physical damage and knocking back players struck.
    • If you position yourself in the melee of Gorechop whenever it is time for a
      ‍Tenderizing Smash      , the pull in effect will not happen which is a very useful tip for range players.
  • Gorechop strikes the tank, inflicting physical damage.

Mordretha, the Endless Empress

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
‍Grasping Rift
‍Manifest Death
‍Dark Devastation
‍Reaping Scythe
‍Echoes of Carnage
  • Mordretha tears open a
    ‍Grasping Rift     that draws all players towards it for 6 seconds.
    • Players that are pulled into the
      ‍Grasping Rift       are afflicted with
      ‍Death Grasp       Curse which stuns them and inflicts shadow damage every 2 seconds for 8 seconds.
      • Look for a Curse dispel if the player afflicted by this survived the initial hit as there is still a chance for him to survive by running out of the
        ‍Grasping Rift        .
  • Mordretha haunts all players, inflicting shadow damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. When this effect expires, it inflicts additional damage to the player and allies within 6 yards.
  • Upon expiration, each player summons a Deathwalker at their location.
    • Deathwalkers cast a
      ‍Death Bolt       at a random target, iflicting shadow damage.
      • Interruptible.
  • Mordretha channels a frontal beam for 4.5 seconds, inflicting shadow damage every 0.5 seconds and pushing back players within it.
    • Be close to the boss to have an easier time dodging the frontal since Mordretha is also rotating around herself during the channel.
  • Mordretha empowers her scythe and strikes the tank, inflicting shadow and physical damage.
  • Upon reaching 50% health, Mordretha inflicts shadow damage to all players and start to constantly inflict ticking shadow damage to the group every 2 seconds until the end of the fight.
  • On top of that, Ghostly Combatants will start to appear on the arena casting
    ‍Echo of Battle     and
    ‍Ghostly Charge    .
    • ‍Echo of Battle
      • Ghostly Combatants clash, inflicting shadow damage to players within 8 yards.
    • ‍Ghostly Charge
      • Ghostly Riders charge across the arena, inflicting shadow damage and knocking back players caught in their path.
        • Be careful, as their model is in fact bigget than they look. Always take an extra step to avoid them.

Lootpool

Patch 11.1 - Undermine(d)
Theater of Pain
Trinkets/Jewelry
Weapons
Armor

Cloth

Leather

Mail

Plate
